attributes.action: Home our ex soldiers before immigrants. Ex soldiers off the streets!
attributes.background: Our ex service men & women are neededing their country, just like our country needed them. Get them off our streets &  in homes safe. They deserve it more than refugees

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107702

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
